summary: Completed comprehensive testing of restaurant reservation management system with HACCP module. Tested both backend APIs (93.3% success rate) and frontend UI functionality across desktop and mobile devices. All core features working correctly.

minor_issues.issue: Returns 403 instead of expected 401 for unauthorized access
Returns 422 instead of expected 400 for invalid data

integration_issues.issue: Navigation links sometimes not immediately clickable after login
Select dropdown options timeout on click in some cases

passed_tests: Public reservation page - complete form and validation
Admin authentication - register and login flow
Dashboard statistics - all metrics displaying correctly
HACCP module - temperature records, cleaning records, alerts
Settings management - time schedules, capacity, open days
Mobile responsiveness - all pages work on mobile devices
Dark mode design - professional appearance throughout
End-to-end reservation flow - public to admin confirmation
